description: My personal website where you'll find all my recent projects and, also, a little bit of who I am

hero.description: Developer with specialization in Frontend, focused on web performance and pleasant UI designs

about.title: About me
about.first-paragraph: My name is Elías Pereyra Gómez, from Argentina. I came across with web development when I studied at high school with the most common languages: HTML, CSS and a little bit of PHP with MariaDB. Then I went to university and there's where I got to know in deep about the concepts of Software Engineering to specialize on this area.
about.second-paragraph: I do a volunteering by contibuting with the freeCodeCamp organization doing translations of tech articles made by the community, from english-spanish.
about.third-paragraph: In my spare time, I read frequently the latest news about Technology, blogs for learning new stuff, conferences, and in addition to technology, I love learning new languages and to work out.

contact.title: Would you like to work with me?
contact.comment: I'd like to hear your proposals and make an incredible work together
contact.name: Name

expense_tracker.desc: An app designed for tracking different types of transactions: incomes and expenses. The project is built with React.js, using the Speechly AI library.
